home.title: XKit Tools
home.subtitle: A powerful suite of social media analysis tools to help you understand your network interaction data

twitterCircle.title: Twitter Interaction Circle
twitterCircle.description: Analyse your Twitter interaction data and generate personalised interaction circle visualisations. Discover which users you interact with most frequently and uncover your core social network.

familyTree.title: Twitter Family Tree
familyTree.description: Visualise your Twitter network as a family tree based on following relationships. Discover mutual connections, followers, and the people you follow in a beautiful tree structure.

comingSoon.title: More Features Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We're working hard to develop more useful Twitter analysis tools, including tweet sentiment analysis, topic trend tracking, user influence assessment, and more. Stay tuned!

dataViz.title: Data Visualisation
dataViz.description: Create interactive data visualisation charts using D3.js

privacy.title: Privacy Protection
privacy.description: All data processing is done locally to protect your privacy

realtime.title: Real-time Analysis
realtime.description: Quickly analyse large amounts of data and generate real-time results

meta.title: XKit Tools - Social Media Analysis Suite
meta.description: A powerful suite of social media analysis tools to help you understand your network interaction data. Create Twitter interaction circles, analyse user engagement, and visualise your social media presence.
meta.keywords: social media analysis, twitter tools, interaction circle, data visualisation, network analysis, twitter analytics, social media insights, user engagement analysis

footer.copyright: © {{year}} XKit Tools. Built with ❤️ by rxliuli.
footer.tagline: XKit Tools - A collection of social media analysis and productivity tools

interactionCircle.title: Twitter Interaction Circle Generator
interactionCircle.subtitle: Analyse your Twitter interaction data and generate personalised interaction circle visualisations

progress.calculating: Calculating interaction weights... Analysed {{replies}} replies and {{likes}} likes
progress.complete: Analysis complete! Generated interaction circle with {{users}} users

errors.imageFailed: Image generation failed, please try again

errors.extensionNotInstalled: Twitter Web API Extension Not Installed or Activated. Please install and activate the extension first.
errors.extensionNotInstalledWithInstructions:
Twitter Web API Extension Not Installed or Activated. Please install and activate the extension first.

Please install the Twitter Web API extension from the Chrome Web Store:
{{url}}

After installation, make sure you are logged into your Twitter account.
errors.getUserFailed: Failed to get user @{{username}} information, please try again
errors.getRepliesFailed: Unable to get reply data, please ensure the browser extension is installed and logged into Twitter
errors.getLikesFailed: Unable to get like data, please ensure the browser extension is installed and logged into Twitter
errors.getFollowingFailed: Unable to get following data, please ensure the browser extension is installed and logged into Twitter
errors.getFollowersFailed: Unable to get followers data, please ensure the browser extension is installed and logged into Twitter
